pre_caption: This is a high-angle, aerial scenery shot overlooking the French Quarter in New Orleans, with the St. Louis Cathedral and Jackson Square centered in the foreground. The video is a static shot with no camera or subject movement. The scene is captured on a foggy, overcast day.
